p-education: Earned a Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering. Developed a strong foundation in diverse technical and theoretical domains, including web and desktop development, game development, data analysis, and algorithms. Specialized in Software Development and applying best practices to design and implement efficient, scalable, and high-quality solutions.
p-projects-1: A modern web application with a responsive design featuring a custom-built CMS, secure authentication, and a robust backend architecture. It includes advanced search functionality, dynamic filtering options, and a feature-rich text editor for effortless and efficient content management. Developed using the MERN stack, the application delivers exceptional performance and scalability.
p-projects-2: A thesis project focused on procedural systems, exploring advanced techniques and methodologies in depth. The project combined theoretical research with practical application, utilizing the Unity Engine to design and implement a Procedural Terrain Generation system.
p-projects-3: Studied and implemented a machine learning model using the MNIST dataset with Python and TensorFlow. The MNIST dataset is a collection of handwritten digits (0â€“9) used for image recognition tasks. The objective was to design and train a model capable of accurately recognizing and predicting the digit in a given image, achieving an accuracy rate of approximately 97.8% to 98.2%.
